column1: Well... about 600+ people worldwide have died of the Corona virus and about 10,000 people have died of our seasonal flu in the US...thats another way to look at it. Ongoing effects...

Coronavirus outbreak: British couple describe life on quarantined cruise... https://youtu.be/tsJ8Eajz84s  via @YouTube | What a sweet couple taking their 14 days' quarantine on ship in stride. @RA90803

Tl;dr: It's not so bad if it doesn't kill you. 
"I have been relatively fortunate: At least six Diamond Princess passengers have died from the virus, of the around 705 passengers who caught it. But coronavirus doesn’t have to be a horrible calamity."
